WorkItem.ClosedComment:
Hi,

I'm closing this work item as this is no longer an issue in Prism. For additional support regarding this subject you could create a thread in the discussions section, where we will help you with your concerns.

Regards,

Damian Cherubini
http://blogs.southworks.net/dcherubini
WorkItem.Description:
Found in V2 Drop 9:
 
On my machine, I'm able to build the Debug configuration with no problems.  However, when trying to build the Release config, the Silverlight Test project throws this error:
 
Warning	1	The file 'Mocks\Modules\RemoteModules.xap' could not be added to the project.  Cannot add a link to the file C:\data\src\PCWorkstation-svn\WelchAllyn\PDK\Microsoft\Practices\Composite\CAL v2\CAL\Silverlight\Composite.Tests\Mocks\Modules\RemoteModules.xap. This file is within the project directory tree.	Composite.Silverlight.Tests
 
I'm not sure what this means, but it is a build issue I'm seeing.

Comments.Message:
We've tested this in both Prism v2.2 and Prism v4. It could be helpful to know that, as of Prism v4, there is no longer a warning for this.

On the other hand, you might find this thread (http://compositewpf.codeplex.com/discussions/55646?ProjectName=compositewpf) handy, where a similar behavior is explained.

Thank you for reporting this.

Guido Leandro Maliandi
http://blogs.southworks.net/gmaliandi
